cleaned_text: Peak Performance Mobile Veterinary Services provides canine / feline home visits, equine farm calls, acupuncture, chiropractic, peaceful in home euthanasia and affordable pet vaccine events. Our veterinarian provides mobile vet services for dogs, cats and horses in Aberdeen, Cameron, Carthage, Fayetteville, Fort Bragg, Hope Mills, Lillington, Pinehurst, Sanford, Spring Lake, Southern Pines, Raeford, Vass, West End, Whispering Pines, NC and the surrounding Sandhills area. ———————— Our mobile veterinary practice offers convenient [home](https://www.ppvs-ks.com/homevisit) visits / house calls for routine veterinary care such as exams, vaccines, heartworm testing, lab work and peaceful at home [euthanasia](https://www.ppvs-ks.com/euthanasia) for dogs and cats as well as veterinary hospice care. We offer farm calls for equine acupuncture, equine chiropractic and equine dental care. Dr. Commerford is certified to provide veterinary [acupuncture](http://www.ppvs-ks.com/acupuncture) for dogs, cats and horses as well as veterinary spinal manipulation aka dog and horse [chiropractic](https://www.ppvs-ks.com/chiropractic) care. We also offer convenient affordable mobile vet clinics for low cost dog and cat vaccines, heartworm testing, microchips, heartworm prevention and oral flea/tick prevention. Learn more about what we offer at these mobile [events](https://www.ppvs-ks.com/mobileclinic). ——————— Many pets feel stressed when receiving treatment at a veterinary office and many pet owners struggle to find time in their busy schedules. For this reason we established a [mobile house call vet](http://www.ppvs-ks.com/homevisit) practice where we can come to you for routine wellness veterinary care (vaccinations, heartworm testing, flea/tick medication etc) as well as chiropractic, acupuncture and end of life care. We also offer convenient [mobile vet events](http://ppvs-ks.com/mobileschedule) in Fayetteville, Sanford, Southern Pines, Hope Mills and surrounding areas so pet owners can attend when it fits their schedule. Our Mission We strive to provide high quality and compassionate veterinary care for each and every patient and believe in treating our furry patients as if they were our own. By remaining a small one doctor veterinary practice we are able to ensure your pet it consistently evaluated by the same veterinarian each time. We believe strongly in gentle handling and we do everything in front of pet parents for absolute transparency in care. We monitor our phone Monday - Friday 9am-4pm. We are not able to answer the phone when we are with clients. Please send us a text and we will get back to you as soon as we are able.
